content: Legion (2016) reignited the war against the Burning Legion and introduced the Broken Isles continent.
Introduced the Demon Hunter hero class, exclusive to Night Elves and Blood Elves.
Artifact weapons provided unique progression and storylines for each class.
Class Order Halls unified heroes of each class against the Legion.
Major raids include Emerald Nightmare, Nighthold, and Antorus, the Burning Throne.
Professions gained questlines and recipes tied to specific zones and factions.
A hidden Demon Hunter skin named 'Eclipse Reaver' was planned but never implemented. (EASTER_EGG)
